'''Shevirme's Funds''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the [[Of Ballads and Brews]] Event Quest, ''[[Charity Event? Securing Funds?]]''.

It is converted to [[Business Earnings]] upon completing ''Charity Event? Securing Funds?''.
